channel.title: How do I make a clan command?
channel.description: I have used Lothys Proper Clans System tutorial, but how do I make a command to work for members in my clan only?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2007, 08:37:43 AM[/size][hr]I wish that someone would answer this [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Please do not double post/bump - the edit function exists for a reason[/center]

item.title: How do I make a clan command?
item.dc:creator: @Terrordog Terrordog
item.description:
@Terrordog wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“clan”)) {
sendMessage(“you justtyped ::clan :D”);
}

lol heres a clan command!!!

item.title: How do I make a clan command?
item.dc:creator: @fireshadow299 fireshadow299
item.description:
@fireshadow299 wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:4, topic:70589”]hold on i think i got it…

ok in my clan system i have 2 clans, 1 zammy and 1 sara, once you join sara you get saraoutfit, this is my command…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saraoutfit")) { if (sara == true) { addItem(1323, 1); addItem(1191, 1); addItem(1153, 1); addItem(1115, 1); addItem(1067, 1); addItem(2412, 1); sendMessage("Wear the clan's colors with pride!"); } else { sendMessage("Hey! You have to join the clan first!"); } }

Notice the void…

if (sara == true) {

dont poet ne commands reported

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dell wrote:

hold on i think i got it…

ok in my clan system i have 2 clans, 1 zammy and 1 sara, once you join sara you get saraoutfit, this is my command…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saraoutfit")) { if (sara == true) { addItem(1323, 1); addItem(1191, 1); addItem(1153, 1); addItem(1115, 1); addItem(1067, 1); addItem(2412, 1); sendMessage("Wear the clan's colors with pride!"); } else { sendMessage("Hey! You have to join the clan first!"); } }

Notice the void…

if (sara == true) {
